meanings.sent1: She had loads of fun at the party.
meanings.sent2: There were loads of books on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: Carrying loads of groceries can be tiring.
meanings.sent4: His backpack felt like loads of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The truck was filled with loads of colorful balloons.

meanings.definition: To put a load on or in
meanings.sent1: He loads the boxes onto the truck.
meanings.sent2: She loads the laundry into the washing machine.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel loads its cheeks with nuts.
meanings.sent4: The worker loads the cargo onto the ship.
meanings.sent5: They load the paint cans into the van carefully.

meanings.definition: To be weighed down or burdened
meanings.sent1: The backpack loads heavily on his shoulders.
meanings.sent2: She loads under the pressure of deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The donkey loads with hay for the journey.
meanings.sent4: His heart loads with sorrow after the loss.
meanings.sent5: The tree loads with snow in the winter.
